title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc. These classes show up prominently in the Open Type dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are displayed in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The Open Type dialog should not display obfuscated classes.
SR: To resolve this issue, there are two options: a) sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter, or b) filter out the obfuscated classes completely. I suggest implementing option a).
